name: angular-related-files
description: Cycle through related Angular files with one shortcut (ALT+O), or see all related files by right-clicking a tab or clicking the icon in the tab bar

angular-related-files.showTabBarButton.description: Show the 'Show Related Angular Files' button in the editor title bar.

angular-related-files.showInContextMenu.description: Show the 'Show Related Angular Files' option in the context menu.

angular-related-files.ignore.description: A list of glob patterns to ignore when searching for related files (e.g., "*.spec.ts", "*.module.ts").

angular-related-files.openInPreview.description: Open related files in preview mode (reusing the same tab).

editor/title.when: (resourceLangId == typescript || resourceLangId == html || resourceLangId == scss || resourceLangId == css || resourceLangId == less || resourceLangId == sass) && config.angular-related-files.showTabBarButton

editor/title/context.when: (resourceLangId == typescript || resourceLangId == html || resourceLangId == scss || resourceLangId == css || resourceLangId == less || resourceLangId == sass) && config.angular-related-files.showInContextMenu

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
